casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY DOCKET

91-2217. Disciplinary Counsel v. Pagac.

Paul Pagac III is found in contempt; he is indefinitely suspended from the practice of law until he complies with Disciplinary Counsel’s letter of inquiry and appears before Disciplinary Counsel pursuant to a subpoena issued by the Board of Commissioners on Grievances and Discipline of the Supreme Court.
